title: Part (c)(i)

title: Part (c)(ii)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value 1 to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2 to score the response.

The response does not earn a point for justifying the solution proposed in (c)(i) by describing a reduction in global climate change or decreasing the amount of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere.
descriptions: The response does not justify the solution proposed in (c)(i) by explaining an additional benefit.
The response justifies the solution proposed in (c)(i) by explaining an additional benefit.
